def_cn: （人、态度、行为）不遵循传统的，异于常人的，标新立异的
def_en: If you describe a person or their attitude or behaviour as unconventional, you mean that they do not behave in the same way as most other people in their society.

def_cn: （做事方式）非传统的，不寻常的，非一般的
def_en: An unconventional way of doing something is not the usual way of doing it, and may be rather surprising.
